optionsNarrowTabGroupColorBar.message: Reduce tab group colour bar width

optionsNarrowTabGroupColorBarDetail.message: Reduce the width of the tab group colour bar.

optionsReadBrowserSettingsDetail.message: Adds permissions that allow the extension to read and modify certain values from browser settings. It is recommended to enable this option for better compatibility with built-in browser behaviours.

optionsUseThemeFrameColor.message: Apply tab background colour as sidebar background colour

optionsUseThemeFrameColorDetail.message: Override the sidebar background colour set by the theme and apply a tab background colour.
